main.name: Luke Harrison
main.occupation: web-developer, visual and musical atist, and consultant.
main.description: I have a passion for music and art, social equity, and the pursuit of technoloical advancment.
main.bio: I am a full-stack web developer, a student of life, and an artist. I view technology as away of monitoring the world’s progress and as a means of giving back to underserved communities. With my work I seek to employ creative, thought provoking solutions to areas of community development, social inequalities, and technological evolution.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me about my previous work, job offers, or commisions.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Make School is a liberal art Computer Science college under Dominican University.

work.title: Art, Voiceacting, Web Dev, Design, Consultation
work.description: I create digital artworks, animations, web desgn, written content, voice work, and full-stack applications. I have created murals for festivals, provided voice lines for independant video production, and have written content for books, blogs, and betas. I have also built websites with and for companies like Elastic, Cruise, General Assembly, Square, and more.

work.title: Web Content Specialist
work.description: As the web content specialist, it was my responsibility to review, create, and adjust written and visual content presented and present on all of the companies online platforms. I often worked with photo editing, marketing, and public outreach team support while in this role.

work.title: Junior Instructor
work.description: Assisted with creating curriculum for coding bootcamp focused on HTML, CSS, and  JavaScript. I assited in creating relationships between students and local businesses. During this time I also created and instructed the companies first Raspberry Pi focused course.

work.title: Junior Web Developer
work.description: As a developer i created and designed static websites using HTML, CSS, and Javascripts. I also assited with customer support and curriculum development.

projects.title: Minerva Facilities

projects.title: Mythril Sheets
projects.category: (Under development) A personalized D&D hub for Group homebrew tracking.

projects.title: The Drip

projects.title: Slayfarer

testimonials.text: Luke is a brilliant problem solver with an eye on efficiency. Luke is capable of synthesizing complex concepts into smaller easier to understand pieces. He was an asset to my team and I would gladly work with him again.

Always available to help, incredibly proficient, and very hard working. In my experience, no project is too much trouble, and with Lukes bredth of experiences he can cover and understand multiple angles of any project. I can recommend his services without hesitation.
